document.full_text: celebrated jazz drummer joe morello, best known for his work with the dave brubeck quartet during the 1950s and 60s, has died. he was 82.
document.title: jazz drummer joe morello dies aged 82
lines_and_colors: celebrated jazz drummer joe morello, best known for his work with the dave brubeck quartet during the 1950s and 60s, has died. he was 82.
